title: The Art Institute of Chicago On the Bridge Mug
description:
This mug features a contemporary illustration of The Art Institute of Chicago’s Modern wing. 

With thousands of possible journey combinations, the museum is never the same place twice. You, the visitor, make it come alive each day.

  • Size: 11 oz.
  • Dimensions: 3.5 x 5 (including handle) in.
  • Material: Ceramic
  • Microwave safe, Dishwasher safe.
  • Illustration by: Morgan Ramberg
